LanguageData.FSFAdvancedBionics.label: Advanced Bionics
LanguageData.FSFAdvancedBionics.description: Craft high-tech bionic body parts to replace lost limbs and eyes. Requires a skilled doctor to attach.
LanguageData.FSFAdvancedSpecializedLimbs.label: Advanced Specialized Limbs
LanguageData.FSFAdvancedSpecializedLimbs.description: Craft high-tech specialized bionic limbs built for specific purposes - both combat and labor.
LanguageData.FSFAdvancedBodyFramesResearch.label: Advanced Body Frames
LanguageData.FSFAdvancedBodyFramesResearch.descriptio: Craft high-tech frames that replace a persons skeletal structure and some of the surrounding tissue.
LanguageData.FSFResearchEnvironmentalImplants.label: Advanced Environmental Implants
LanguageData.FSFResearchEnvironmentalImplants.descrip: Craft high-tech implants that assist in dealing with environmental hazards.
LanguageData.FSFResearchCombatImplants.label: Advanced Combat Implants
LanguageData.FSFResearchCombatImplants.description: Craft high-tech brain implants that assist the user in processing information in combat scenarios.
